CustomField.description: Before Close Won, SSC/System Admin should be able to mark the Opportunity as "Non-Reseller" opportunity, so that the agent opportunity will become eligible for VAT Refund.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Before Close Won, SSC/System Admin should be able to mark the Opportunity as "Non-Reseller" opportunity, so that the agent opportunity will become eligible for VAT Refund.
CustomField.label: Non Reseller Agent
